subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Dany Bahar, chief executive of Group Lotus, hopes the new Lotus Renault GP Formula One team will become "the challenger" of the elite racing series that begins Sunday in Melbourne.
snippet: Dany Bahar, chief executive of Group Lotus, hopes the new Lotus Renault GP Formula One team will become "the challenger" of the elite racing series that begins Sunday in Melbourne.
